title: Making Sex Offenders Pay -- and Pay and Pay and Pay
description: Sure, sex crimes are horrific, and the perpetrators deserve to be punished harshly. But society keeps exacting costs -- out-of-pocket and otherwise -- long after the prison sentence has been served.
